effect.scarlet_violet: Inflicts regular damage, then (if successful) sets light screen on the user’s side of the field.

short_effect.scarlet_violet: Sets Light Screen on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.
short_effect.the_teal_mask: Sets Light Screen on the user’s side of the field after inflicting damage.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user condenses energy within its body and unleashes that energy from its core to inflict damage.
